title: Task 41

question.text: In the context of an alarm clock, what does hitting the snooze button multiple times imply?

answers.feedback: While this could be a strategy, multiple times in this context refers to repeatedly delaying the alarm.
Hitting the snooze button is about delaying the alarm, not checking the time.

answers.answer: Delaying the alarm several times before getting up
Turning off the alarm after it rings once
answers.feedback: Multiple times implies the action is repeated, not done just once.

description:
Multiple times means many times or on several occasions. It's used to indicate that an action or event happens repeatedly. For example:

He checked his phone multiple times during the meeting (indicates he checked his phone many times)
